Name: Washed Up!
About the game: Washed Up! is an action puzzler where blocks are washing up on the beaches of your pristine atoll, and you and your crab helpers must tidy them up! Take blocks from the beach and arrange them into squares in the middle to score points and keep your beaches clean. A different take on the puzzle-block-arranging genre that requires you to manage two sides at once, while giving you lots more choice of which blocks to place next. But can you think fast enough to outpace the waves? Features Pentomino arranging fun Classic, Time Attack and Free Play game modes Risk-reward mechanic: can you extend squares before they fill up for big points? Power-ups: cannons, explosive blocks and time-rewinding ships clocks Special storm rush mode Online leaderboards Play with keyboard, game pad or drag/drop using the mouse
